Extra Curricular

PUBLIC ART INTERVENTIONS   •   2018
Creator & Participant Worked in a team to create a public art installment on HKUST campus to promote art and creativity. Our work Scope was a piece which played on the themes of dimensionality and perspective, by creating a 3D shape in the negative space of 2D sheets of paper. We were all responsible for concept design, material gathering, implementation and installing the exhibition.



); } export default ExtraCur;
